channel.title: Apple on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on Scott O'Brien

item.title: ZFS and Apple Time Machine, a perfect team
item.description: So lately I’ve been thinking about my backup strategy on my Mac. From previous posts you might know I’ve build my OpenIndiana ZFS FileServer. Well, just created a volume and decided to put 300GB to good use to create a time machine on my mac. There is a brilliant guide on how to do it here and suggest you all take a look (Thanks for the awesome guide Marco).

item.title: Apple feeling slow?
item.description: Is your Apple Mac feeling slow? p.s. this is a joke, don’t actually do it
